alert.note: Alert for Pike; Scott (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 9:20PM CST until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at Valley City. Illinois River at Meredosia. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at La Grange LD. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River at Valley City. * WHEN...From Sunday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, The road to Norbut Fish and Wildlife area is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CST Friday the stage was 12.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Sunday evening and continue rising to 17.0 feet Thursday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Illinois River Valley City 14.0 12.7 13.6 14.4 15.2 15.9 16.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
